item.title: nlrx - The best R package for running NetLogo simulation
item.description: Intro From the previous blog, you might have noticed the rationale of using high performance computing (HPC), and how fast it is to obtain results compared to our local machines. Having installed all the software requirements on the HPC, todayâ€™s post is to simulate a NetLogo model of my Ph.D work in R using an nlrx package(https://ropensci.github.io/nlrx/). nlrx has promoted its uniqueness for adopting .XML to excecute files that contain various conditions (i.
